Are you still there? It took me a while to figure out how to get the PID of the most switching process. Try this, maybe work it up some more. "for pid in /proc/{1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9}*; do echo "$(basename $pid) $(cat $pid/sched | grep nr_switches | awk '{print $3}')"; done | sort -n -k 2"

That'll give you a sorted list with "PID nr_switches"
